description: The initiative at Alstom focuses on enhancing biodiversity and employee well-being through various projects. Originating from a group of employees in Lyon, it includes creating green spaces, establishing beehives, and providing organic fruit baskets. These efforts align with the company's CSR objectives, emphasizing quality of life at work. The biodiversity group operates voluntarily, supported by management and partnerships with local organizations, fostering a culture of sustainability and community engagement within the workplace.
name: Groupe Biodiversit√© Alstom
